Description: Detected a Generic API Key, potentially exposing access to various services and sensitive operations.
Author: Link (Team Reflectt)
Message:
fix: add gitleaks baseline for historical findings on push-to-main

Full-history scan on push was failing with 21 findings from deleted
artifacts/idle-nudge/ env dumps in git history. Baseline file suppresses
known historical findings while still catching new leaks.

- .gitleaksbaseline.json: 21 baselined findings (all in deleted files)
- secret-scan.yml: push scan uses --baseline-path
- PR scans unchanged (diff-only, no baseline needed)
- Verified: 0 leaks with baseline applied

fix: add gitleaks baseline for historical findings on push-to-main

Full-history scan on push was failing with 21 findings from deleted
artifacts/idle-nudge/ env dumps in git history. Baseline file suppresses
known historical findings while still catching new leaks.

- .gitleaksbaseline.json: 21 baselined findings (all in deleted files)
- secret-scan.yml: push scan uses --baseline-path
- PR scans unchanged (diff-only, no baseline needed)
- Verified: 0 leaks with baseline applied

Description: Detected a Generic API Key, potentially exposing access to various services and sensitive operations.
